Do your pawns always have the right tool for the job? Then why the hell don't they use them already?
With this mod, pawns carrying a tool relevant to their current job will equip them when starting the job. Does NOT activate when drafted or hunting.
[b]Update:[/b] This mod now also adds the ability to command colonists to pick up specific items to carry around in their inventory even when not part of a caravan.
[b]Update again:[/b] Pawns will now switch back to their previously equipped weapon when finished using a tool for a job
[h2]Useful mods[/h2] [hr][/hr] Easier manual switching of tools/weapons: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2226330302]Pocket Sand[/url]
Mods with tools: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1814383360]Vanilla Weapons Expanded[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2352893469]Primitive Tools[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2027628615]Toolmetrics Redux (Continued)[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1851407975]Medieval Madness: Tools of the Trade[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2168169520]Gimmicks (Continued)[/url]
